title: Have a question about account being lock down.
body: My friend said his account is been lock down by riot because riot said he used third party program but he really didn't how can he get his account back or is there any solution for this?

replies.body:
I appreciate that you care about your friend enough to reach out about this. Your friend will have to reach out to our specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about their suspension.

Let me know if you have any questions.
